definition: to retreat/to decline/to move back/to withdraw
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: For flat glass, heat tempering is most often used.
sentences.chinese: 對於平板玻璃，熱退火是最常用的。

sentences.english: But tempering alone is usually not enough.
sentences.chinese: 但是單純的退火是不夠的。

sentences.english: The reducing annealing furnace is adopted.
sentences.chinese: 採用無氧化還原退火爐。

sentences.english: After logarithm fetch on minimum of viscosity, which get linear relation with pre-annealed temperature.
sentences.chinese: 粘度極小值取對數之後與預退火溫度成線性關係。

sentences.english: The rangeability of magnetic induction effect enhance after annealing.
sentences.chinese: 退火可以提高非晶薄帶的磁感應效應變化幅度。

sentences.english: These indicate that the film annealed at 600℃ has the best crystalline quality.
sentences.chinese: 這表明在600℃下退火的樣品具有最好的晶化質量。

sentences.english: Effects of annealing treatment on physical properties of a dental all-ceramic system.
sentences.chinese: 退火處理對牙科全瓷冠物性的影響。

sentences.english: Annealing also relieves internal stresses previously set up in the metal.
sentences.chinese: 退火也釋放了先前在金屬中的內應力。

sentences.english: At present, hot-air circulation annealing lehrs is the most advanced glass annealing device.
sentences.chinese: 熱風循環退火爐是目前最先進的玻璃製品退火設備。

sentences.english: At present, hot-air circulation annealing lehrs is the most advanced glass annealing device.
sentences.chinese: 熱風循環退火爐是目前最先進的玻璃製品退火設備。

sentences.english: The effects of annealing on superconducting transition and the thermostability of MgB.
sentences.chinese: 超導體制備過程中的退火效應和熱穩定性的實驗研究。

sentences.english: The influence of SG inoculant on graphitizing annealing of malleable cast iron was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了SG變質劑對可鍛鑄鐵石墨化退火的影響。

sentences.english: Lead or annealed copper washers are most often used in fluorine and other reactive fluoride service.
sentences.chinese: 鉛或退火銅墊圈最經常用於氟和其它活潑氟化物設施。

sentences.english: In this paper, a mean field annealing neural network approach for the timing driven macro cell placement problem is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 文中提出了一個宏單元佈局的均場退火網絡求解方法。

sentences.english: The effects of cobalt on the reduction of molybdenum powder and mechanical properties of annealed Mo wire were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了鈷對鉬粉還原過程及退火鉬絲力學性能的影響。

definition: to straighten/(fig.) to mend one's ways
to sinter/to agglomerate ore by burning
to temper (iron)/to flare back/flareback (in a gas burner)/(of an engine) to backfire
thermal cleavage (i.e. sth splits when heated)
